item.title: CVE-2024-9124|2024-10-08T16:23:09.331Z -- rockwell%20automation -- drives%20-%20powerflex%206000t
item.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the Rockwell Automation PowerFlexÂ® 600T. If the device is overloaded with requests, it will become unavailable. The device may require a power cycle to recover it if it does not re-establish a connection after it stops receiving requests.
